Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

The old Maximal Base had been abandoned for quite some time; ever since Jhiaxus
blew down the doors to the base and scattered those inside.
Salveo had been on that team that plucked Windlord, Cup, Nightlight from the
battle and chased off the attacker.


"Bring us around to the front of the structure." said Perseus calmly.
"We're going to have to take a look inside, you never know who may be
inside.  Do I have any volunteers for the entry team?"

Guardia raised her hand quietly, looking around at the other Maximals



*Tag: All Maximal with Perseus, anyone else that might be on the ground near
Relay City.*

--00c09f8e5c14b8a91f0475c2e1fe
